sentence: Rep. Scott Perry, R-Pa., told Newsmax on Tuesday that President Biden is burning the economy down while “people are scrambling for their lives to try to afford the prices at the pump and across the supply chain spectrum.” During an appearance on “Stinchfield,” the Pennsylvania congressman compared Biden’s record on energy policy to a “pyromaniac that works at the fire company.” “The first thing he did on day one is set the fire by canceling the Keystone [XL] pipeline,” Perry said.

title: Rep. Scott Perry to Newsmax: Biden Is Burning the Economy Down
